query.text:
pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where name !in ("SysOperationSandboxForm", "SysBoxForm", "Dialog")
| extend ['Activity Id'] = customDimensions.activityId 
| where isempty(['_userId']) or user_Id == ['_userId']
| where isempty(['_activityId']) or ['Activity Id'] in (['_activityId'])
| summarize ["Form Opens"] = count() by name 
| top 20 by ["Form Opens"] desc

tiles.title: Form usage by longest average duration
tiles.description: Shows executions time statistics grouped by form name. Execution times include the averages, min and max durations and accumulated total time.

query.text:
pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where duration > 0
| extend ['Activity Id'] = customDimensions.activityId 
| where isempty(['_userId']) or user_Id == ['_userId']
| where isempty(['_activityId']) or ['Activity Id'] in (['_activityId'])
| where isempty(['_formName']) or name == ['_formName']
| project ['Form name'] = name, duration
| summarize     ['Number of executions']            = count()
            ,   ['Avg duration (s)']                = round(avg(duration)/1000,2)
            ,   ['Min duration (s)']                = round(min(duration)/1000,2)
            ,   ['Max duration (s)']                = round(max(duration)/1000,2)
            ,   ['Percentile 95 (s)']               = round(percentile(duration,95)/1000,2)
            ,   ['Accumulated total duration (s)']  = round(sum(duration)/1000,2) by ['Form name'] 
| order by ['Avg duration (s)'] desc

tiles.title: Form execution spread
tiles.description: Shows the form usage taking into account the time range, user, activity and form name.

query.text:
pageViews
| extend ['Activity Id'] = customDimensions.activityId
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where isempty(['_userId']) or user_Id == ['_userId']
| where isempty(['_activityId']) or ['Activity Id'] in (['_activityId'])
| where isempty(['_formName']) or name == ['_formName']
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp,1h)

pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| extend ['Legal entity'] = toupper((customDimensions.LegalEntity))
| summarize count() by ['Legal entity']

tiles.title: Form instance execution times
tiles.description: Shows the individual instances of this form and the respective opening times.

query.text:
pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where duration > 0
| extend ['Activity Id'] = customDimensions.activityId 
| where isempty(['_userId']) or user_Id == ['_userId']
| where isempty(['_activityId']) or ['Activity Id'] in (['_activityId'])
| where isempty(['_formName']) or name == ['_formName']
| project ['Time stamp'] = timestamp, ['Activity Id'], ['Form Name'] = name, ['Duration (s)'] = round(duration/1000,2)

tiles.title: Form duration trend
tiles.description: Shows executions time statistics grouped by form name. Execution times include the averages, min and max durations and accumulated total time.

query.text:
let _startTime30Days = ago(30d);
let _startTime14Days = ago(14d);
let _startTime7Days = ago(7d);
let _pageViews30Days = pageViews
                        | where timestamp between (_startTime30Days .. now())
                        | where duration > 0
                        | where isempty(['_formName']) or name == ['_formName']
                        | project ['Form name'] = name, duration,timestamp;
let _pageViews30DaysAgg =   _pageViews30Days
                            | summarize ['30 days average (s)']           = round(avg(duration)/1000,2) by ['Form name']
                            | order by ['30 days average (s)'] desc;
let _pageViews14DaysAgg =   _pageViews30Days
                            | where timestamp between (_startTime14Days .. now())
                            | summarize ['14 days average (s)']           = round(avg(duration)/1000,2) by ['Form name']
                            | order by ['14 days average (s)'] desc;
let _pageViews7DaysAgg =    _pageViews30Days
                            | where timestamp between (_startTime7Days .. now())
                            | summarize     ['7 days executions']            = count()
                                        ,   ['7 days average (s)']           = round(avg(duration)/1000,2) by ['Form name']
                            | order by ['7 days average (s)'] desc;                        
_pageViews7DaysAgg
| lookup kind=leftouter _pageViews14DaysAgg on ['Form name']
| lookup kind=leftouter _pageViews30DaysAgg on ['Form name']
| extend ['14 Day trend'] = round(100 - ((['7 days average (s)'] / ['14 days average (s)'])*100),2)
| extend ['30 Day trend'] = round(100 - ((['7 days average (s)'] / ['30 days average (s)'])*100),2)
| project ['Form name'], ['7 days executions'], ['7 days average (s)'], ['14 Day trend'], ['30 Day trend']

tiles.title: Form instance execution times
tiles.description: Shows the individual instances of this form and the respective opening times.

query.text:
pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where duration > 0
| extend ['Activity Id'] = customDimensions.activityId 
| where isempty(['_userId']) or user_Id == ['_userId']
| where isempty(['_activityId']) or ['Activity Id'] in (['_activityId'])
| where isempty(['_formName']) or name == ['_formName']
| project ['Time stamp'] = timestamp, ['Form Name'] = name, ['Duration (s)'] = round(duration/1000,2)

pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| project user_Id
| distinct user_Id

parameters.description: Identification of the activity interacting with forms

query.text:
pageViews
| extend ActivityId = tostring(customDimensions.activityId)
| distinct ActivityId

pageViews
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| distinct name
